titleStmt.title: The Saints refvge ∫ A sermon / preached by a reverend divine, and now published by a welwiller to the truth for the comfort of Gods people.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iames Moxon or Thomas Lappadg, and re [sic] to be sold at his shop neree the Iron-Bridge,
